text: No Down Payment is a 1957 American drama movie. It was directed by Martin Ritt. The movie is based on the book of the same name by John McPartland. Actors include Joanne Woodward, Sheree North, Tony Randall, Jeffrey Hunter, Cameron Mitchell, and Barbara Rush.
